data.name: plView.Help
data.value: Select how the module should display

data.name: plWidth.Help
data.value: Enter the width of a Calendar day cell in pixels

data.name: plHeight.Help
data.value: Enter the height of a Calendar day cell in pixels

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About The Events Settings

The Events Module displays event information within a calendar display or as a list of events.  There are 3 Event Settings that control the display and action performed within the module. 

  • Display Format – controls whether events are displayed as a list or within a calendar display.
    • List – displays events in a list without a calendar.  Events are listed according to the start date for an individual event.  If an event spans a time period, the event continues to display until the event expiry date has passed.
    • Calendar   - displays an event in a calendar cell for that corresponds to the start date of the event.  If an event is defined to occur over a period of time, the event will only display in the calendar cell for that corresponds to the start date of the event.
  • Calendar Cell Width – set the number of pixels across a calendar day cell to allot for an event display.  Actual calendar cell width rendered is dependent on number of items to display, and the module defined panel placement.
  • Calendar Cell Height – set the number of pixels in height available for a calendar day cell. Actual calendar cell height rendered is dependent on number of items to display, and the module defined panel placement.

data.name: valWidth.Text
data.value: Width must be a number greater than zero

data.name: valHeight.Text
data.value: Height must be a number greater than zero
